com.google.android.exoplayer2

Class ExoPlayerImplInternal.MediaPeriodHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.ExoPlayerImplInternal.MediaPeriodHolder
  • Enclosing class:
    ExoPlayerImplInternal

    private static final class ExoPlayerImplInternal.MediaPeriodHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds a MediaPeriod with information required to play it as part of a timeline.
